attributes.action: Remove religious ideologies from the national curriculum that are taught ‘as a matter of fact’
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Teaching children matters of faith in a manner which implies fact, when overwhelming evidence suggests to the contrary, especially those children who through age or ability are not able to rationalise and question what is fed to them, is the most heinous of crimes. 

The one true freedom we have in this world is to think what we wish and indoctrinating young minds in the manner which continues to take place in every first/primary school in the UK is denying them of that most basic of human rights.

Join the petition and show your support for removing matters of faith from the national curriculum to promote the development of balanced, independent and free thinking minds that this nation sorely needs…
